author: Graeme McMillan
title: Judge Dredd Foreshadowed Our Covid Reality
description: It’s not the first time the comic serial has proven prophetic.
content: Last week, three US statesCalifornia, Washington, and Oregonannounced a new deal. Known as the Western States Pact, the agreement essentially combined the three entities into a West Coast super state for the purposes of dealing with Covid-19 and coordinating … [+3970 chars]
